body_html:
+1 on this. The error also arose if checkpoint_path=None. The error message should warn the ckpt file may not exist.
Also it may be useful to know that a missing protobuf in the checkpoint_path directory gives checkpoint_path=None while an error message would be more useful. HTH.

body:
+1 on this. The error also arose if checkpoint_path=None. The error message should warn the ckpt file may not exist. 
Also it may be useful to know that a missing protobuf in the checkpoint_path directory gives  checkpoint_path=None while an error message would be more useful. HTH.
